message.body: I'm sorry about what your mom said :( that's really rough
Yeah it sucks but at least I know where she stands right now. I just don't know how long I can stand it
Oh well at least if I'm disowned I will be prepared :)
Is that what she meant? Or does she mean she just doesn't agree with it or something?
I mean I think if I start transitioning she will not want anything to do with me. Or if I tell her that I identify as trans
I'm sorry :( better to be prepared I guess?
